mapper.select: select no, title, contents, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no=#{categoryNo } order by no

choose.when: select no, title, contents, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no=#{categoryNo } order by no limit 0, 1
choose.otherwise: select no, title, contents, category_no as categoryNo from post where category_no=#{categoryNo } and no=#{postNo } limit 0, 1

mapper.insert: insert into post values(null, #{postVo.title }, #{postVo.contents }, (select no from category where blog_id=#{id } and name=#{postVo.categoryName }))
